programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2, S01E02, In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Mystery of the Milky Way, S01E01, The Mystery of the Milky Way chronicles the history of telescopes, from Galileo's refractor to Newton's reflector and beyond. This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

programme.title: The Ever Expanding Universe
programme.desc: Hunting the Edge of Space: The Ever Expanding Universe, S01E02, The Ever-Expanding Universe investigates a battery of high-tech telescopes that are joining the Hubble Space Telescope on its quest to unlock the secrets of our universe, a cosmos almost incomprehensible in its size, age and violence.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Last Curtain

programme.title: Who Done It?
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E05, A dead body discovered outside of a church leads to a world of sex, drugs, and Halloween pranks.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E10, A woman is bludgeoned to death in her own home, and her severely handicapped teenage daughter goes missing. When investigators eventually catch up with the young woman, they hear a baffling story of a mother's toxic love.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E16, An anti-drug crusader's home is torched. But when a body is discovered in the freezer, the curious case of arson becomes a twisted tale of fratricide.

programme.title: Bloody Valentine
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E09, My wife's bleeding all over the place," Dr. John Baxter Hamilton tells the 911 operator. "I don't know, she looks like somebody hurt her," but the science suggests a crime of heated rage and cold calculation.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E14, After the owner of a private school for Asian students vanishes from his driveway, police scramble to find him as time begins to run out on the diabetic man. Investigators learn he has been kidnapped, but can they save him before it is too late?

programme.title: The Woman in the Leopard Dress
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S01E05, A drunken brawl at a bar culminates in the stabbing death of a regular.

programme.title: Bloodbath in the Bottoms
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S02E01, A vicious shooting leaves three friends dead in Shreveport.

programme.title: Killing Spree
programme.desc: The First 48, S01E06, Police try to convince the frightened residents of a Miami housing project to help them track down the man who's been terrorizing the community. But after the third murder in a month, no one even calls 911.

programme.title: Twist of Fate
programme.desc: The First 48, S09E01, In Louisville, a community is outraged when a married couple is gunned down at home in front of their two young children.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye/Dead End
programme.desc: The First 48, S09E09, In Louisville, Det. Carl Payne and the homicide team investigate the murder of a young man shot to death in the middle of the street in broad daylight.

programme.title: The Murder of Gemma McCluskie
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E109, The body of Eastenders actress, Gemma McCluskie was discovered in the Regents canal in 2012. Dogged detective work and detailed forensic examination eventually led police to her killer.

programme.title: Betrayed - The Murder of David Jackson
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E115, In 1988, 24-year-old David Jackson left his home in Pembroke Pines, Florida, to buy beer and cigarettes. He was never seen again. For 15 years his disappearance remained unsolved.

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Almost Unsolved, S01E05, Two teenagers are executed in a lover's lane, and over sixty years later technology finally catches up to help track down their mysterious killer.

programme.title: Karma

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E04, The Doctor is captured by the villagers who are under the Master’s control. Jo goes to the church to prevent the Master from summoning Azal for the final time but is too late.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daemons, S01E05, UNIT have penetrated the heat barrier and launch an attack on the gargoyle, Bok. In the cavern, the Daemon Azal confronts the Doctor and the Master to decide the fate of mankind.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E01, When Sir Reginald Styles claims to have seen a ghost, UNIT is called in. The Doctor and Jo spend the night at Styles' house and become the target of an assassin.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E02, As captive of the guerrillas, the Doctor discovers they intend to change history. Jo is transported to the 22nd Century where she unwittingly gives vital information to the Daleks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor arrives in a bleak future where Earth is ruled by the Daleks and mankind is enslaved. Rescuing Jo, the two escape but the brutish Ogrons are in pursuit.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Day of the Daleks, S01E04, The Controller betrays the Daleks and is exterminated. The Daleks travel back in time to the 20th Century to ensure that the peace conference fails.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E01, The planet Peladon is hoping to join the Galactic Federation. But King Peladon’s Chancellor has been murdered and it seems that the legendary royal beast, Aggedor is to blame.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E02, The work of the committee is hampered by sabotage, fear, and suspicion. The Doctor knows the Ice Warriors of old and believes that they may be the guilty party.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E03, The Doctor is sentenced to a fight to the death in the pit with the King’s champion, Grun. But the saboteur and killer is still at large.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Curse of Peladon, S01E04, Hepesh, supported by the delegate from Arcturus, is revealed to be behind the attacks. Arcturus is killed but Hepesh escapes to rouse a rebellion against the King.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Runner
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E03, The search for Lt. Ford leads Sheppard and Teyla to planet P3M-736 where they are captured by Ronon Dex, a man who is on the run, being hunted by the Wraith. The team offer to help Ronon, going up against the Wraith once again.

programme.title: Duet
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E04, While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Condemned
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E05, The team discover a planet that has cruel punishments for anyone who commits a crime; they are placed near the Stargate to be taken by the Wraith. This proves to be too effective forcing the society to put innocent folk in jail to please the Wraith.

programme.title: Trinity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E06, The team discover the remains of an experiment the Ancients were working on to create the ultimate power generator and McKay believes he can finish what the Ancients started. Teyla and Ronon discover Ronon is not the last of his kind.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E07, Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes he’s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E01, As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E02, Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E013, Brandon encourages Emily to pursue her dreams and Steve is caught stealing.

programme.title: Windstruck
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E014, Donna and David celebrate their first year together. Dylan and Kelly get back together, while Andrea falls in love with a new boyfriend.

programme.title: Somewhere in the World It's Christmas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E015, The Walshes trip to Hawai'i doesn't go as planned when their plane is turned around due to technical problems.

programme.title: Crunch Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E016, Steve has trouble at the fraternity house and David relies on drugs to keep himself awake through finals week.

programme.title: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E017, Kelly asks David if he is using drugs and Andrea gets surprising news from the doctor's office.

programme.title: Heartbreaker
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E018, David has his first session with a psychologist and Andrea realizes her pregnancy will affect her educational plans.

programme.title: The Labors of Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E019, Andrea decides to have an abortion and Nat has surgery.

programme.title: Scared Very Straight
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E020, Jesse and Andrea set a wedding date and Donna asks David to the Valentine dance.

programme.title: Addicted to Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E021, Brenda and Stuart get stranded in the desert. Kelly helps Brandon avoid suspicion by posing as his girlfriend.

programme.title: Change Partners
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E022, Brandon and Kelly go on a weekend retreat, while Dylan and Lucinda spend time together. Brenda and Donna take in a stray dog.

programme.title: A Pig Is a Boy Is a Dog
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E023, Donna is heartbroken when Rocky dies. Brandon and Lucinda break up and Kelly tells Dylan about her moment with Brandon.

programme.title: Cuffs and Links
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E024, Brenda is arrested for breaking and entering into the college medical lab. Afterward, her friends avoid her to avoid being seen as accessories.

programme.title: The Time Has Come Today
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E025, Brenda finds an old diary and spends spring break in a different era, while the rest of the gang goes to Palm Springs.

programme.title: Necessity Is A Mother
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E010, When Dylan's long-absent mother moves back into his life - not to mention into his home - things come to a head, forcing Dylan to confront his issues not only with his mother, but with himself as well.

programme.title: The Kindness of Strangers
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E015, The Walshes share Thanksgiving with the homeless man that Brandon had met during the summer.

programme.title: Radar Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E012, Brandon takes an unexpected road trip and Dylan accepts a Thanksgiving dinner invitation at the Walsh's after declining an invitation from Kelly.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Glass Cut Teen/Psychic Cop

programme.title: Boomer’s Rescue/It’s a Boy

programme.title: Pool Neighbor/ATV Barbed Wire

programme.title: Plowed Under/CPR Baby

programme.title: Speed Dial Burn/Pregnant Tumbler

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.
